title: Homemade Poet Recipe
body: 2. In a bowl, mix the writer the beautiful thing.
3. Let it sit for some time. If done correctly, the writer should begin smiling.
4. Separate the ingredients to the best of your ability. You may throw away the beautiful thing, or use it for another recipe later.
5. Let the writer sit for some time. If done correctly, the writer should stop smiling.
